data.title: Betsy Atkins – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Betsy Atkins. Browse Betsy Atkins’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Betsy Atkins Betsy is a 3 time CEO and serial entrepreneur co-founding enterprise software companies in the energy, healthcare and software industries. She scaled companies through hyper growth, and led companies to successful IPO and acquisitions such as Clear Standards bought by SAP and Ascend Communications, $5.4B in revenue acquired by Lucent for $23B. She has worked behind the scenes at companies like Chico’s, Vonage, Darden Restaurants, NASDAQ, HealthSouth, Wix, and Schneider Electric. She has served on over 30 public boards and been through 13 IPOs. Her Corporate Board experience covers industries including: Technology, Financial Services, Healthcare, CPG, Automotive, Manufacturing, and Industrial. She brings an operational perspective of how to tech enable your business and use tech to accelerate business solutions and “time-to-insight” for enterprise customers and consumers. She leverages broad contemporary knowledge of digital technology to reduce costs, drive efficiency and productivity using AI machine learning analytics to streamline processes. Betsy brings vision for new consumer experiences, relentless customer focus and high business discipline around execution. Betsy has written three books including, “Be Board Ready: The Secrets to Landing a Board Seat and Being a Great Director” and “Behind Boardroom Doors: Lessons of a Corporate Director”. Corporate Governance Thought Leadership Publications/Appearances: Newly published book, Be Board Ready. Regular Contributor: WSJ, Forbes, CNBC PowerLunch, Bloomberg appearances and Yahoo Finance commentator. Betsy is a thought leader on ESG. She is currently serving on 2 public company boards: Wynn Resorts and SL Green and is a Board Member at Volvo Car Corporation (private).
